data.Sentence_cn: 我们的邻居查尔斯.艾利森船长明天就要从朴次茅斯启航了。
data.Sentence: Our neighbour, Captain Charles Alison, will sail from Portsmouth tomorrow.

data.Sentence_cn: 明天一大早我们将在码头为他送行。
data.Sentence: We'll meet him at the harbour early in the morning.

data.Sentence_cn: 他将乘坐他的“涛波赛”号小艇。
data.Sentence: He will be in his small boat, Topsail.
Topsail is a famous little boat.

data.Sentence_cn: 它已经多次横渡大西洋。
data.Sentence: It has sailed across the Atlantic many times.

data.Sentence_cn: 艾利森船长将于8点钟启航，因此我们有充裕的时间。
data.Sentence: Captain Alison will set out at eight o'clock, so we'll have plenty of time.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们将参观他的船，然后和他告别。
data.Sentence: We'll see his boat and then we'll say goodbye to him.
He will be away for two months.
We are very proud of him.

data.Sentence_cn: 他将参加一次重大的横渡大西洋的比赛。
data.Sentence: He will take part in an important race across the Atlantic.
